pkgmetadata.longdescription: Complex-Valued Lasso and Complex-Valued Graphical Lasso // Implements 'glmnet'-style complex-valued lasso and complex- valued graphical lasso using a 'pathwise' coordinate descent algorithm for complex-valued parameters. The package provides supporting tools for estimation, simulation, and prediction. See Deb (2024) doi:10.48550/ArXiv.2401.11128 for the algorithm description.
